Text.val: 22.04.2011 JH SCR16392 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and GB002 by GB902
08.06.2010 GB SCR15570 Changed value of update the TMPL_LEDG_NO
3. All batch payment rows handled - update BATCH
If V.EXCHDIFFH = 0 then continue with the next BATCH else
Only if BTCP_AMOUNTCURRH <> V.AMOUNTH set BTCP_AMOUNTCURRH = V.AMOUNTH

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (BTCP_AMOUNTCURRH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/BTCP where BTCP_BTCH_ID = :2 :3 for fetch only
